recommendations: Rohit Jain â€œI had the privilege to work with Sonam in INDmoney. Her understanding of tech recruitment, commitment to nurturing culture, and excellence in automating HR practices were instrumental to our success. She's adept at spotting talent and implementing efficient systems, always balancing company values with operational needs. Any organization would greatly benefit from her strategic mindset, compassionate leadership, and dedication. I highly recommend Sonam as a HR Leader. â€

Swati Gupta â€œSonam was a great team member who helped me understand the organization and people practices in an industry which was very new to me! She was extremely patient, hard-working, accessible to employees apart from being very positive and displaying a problem solving approach. She never shied away from learning new things, managing the change and taking up challenges and she did that with a smile. Hope to work with her again in the futureâ€
